data.message:
So Eminem, if you could just send that to Cuba for me, id greatly appreciate that 😂😂 
Even tho its not from Stan...
"Switch it up and watch them haterz not give it up cuz their just not good enough but im not giving up till i get my respect and i wont stop til i get enough cuz im not livin up to my own expectations. Awww... that hater alarm is soundin off and Obama took the bomb from my name."
- Seduction 🔥🔥🔥

replies.message: Eminem, I only sing your lyrical songs for karaoke nights. I get crowds everytime. I am Stan, back from the dead and the dam i fell in 😲😲
